name: Asana Capabilities
description: Evaluation dataset for Asana subagent capabilities including task management, projects, sections, and goals. Includes lazy queries, intentional mistakes, and ambiguous items.

items.input: create task 'Review documentation' in my project
items.expected_output: 1. Get workspaces. 2. Find project. 3. Create task in project.
Get tasks assigned to current user.
1. Get workspaces. 2. Create project with name.

items.input: add task to In Progress section
items.expected_output: 1. Find task. 2. Find section 'In Progress'. 3. Add task to section.
1. Get workspace. 2. Create tag with name and color.

items.input: add followers to the deployment task
items.expected_output: 1. Find deployment task. 2. Add followers to task.

items.input: set due date for task to next friday
items.expected_output: 1. Find task. 2. Update task with due_on date.
1. Find task. 2. Find user sarah. 3. Update task assignee.
1. Find review task. 2. Mark task as completed.
List all projects in user's workspace.
1. Find project. 2. Create section with name.

items.input: add comment to task about blockers
items.expected_output: 1. Find task. 2. Create story/comment on task.
1. Find old project. 2. Request confirmation. 3. Delete project.
items.context: User wants to delete - needs consent

items.expected_output: 1. Recognize 'asanna' as typo for 'asana'. 2. Get goals.
1. Get workspace. 2. Create goal with name.
1. Find goal. 2. Find supporting project/task. 3. Add relationship.
1. Find project Alpha. 2. Get tasks in project.
1. Find main task. 2. Create task with parent.

items.input: allocate time for john on project
items.expected_output: 1. Find user john. 2. Find project. 3. Create allocation.
Get teams in user's workspace.
